item.title: The things which we should check before finalizing our design
item.description: Whenever we design something like any website or app, we always concern about different issues like how it will look like, will it be user-friendly, will it fulfill the need of clients? To answer all these questions, I am going to discuss the things which we should check or do before finalizing our design. I think these things can help you to a great extent. We are living in an era of digitization and websites play an important role in any business.

item.title: Accessible Design
item.description: In this blog post , I am going to discuss about accessible web-designing. I will explain elements and principles of accessible design and also tips for accessible web designing. Accessible Design We live in an independent society, in which all the people have right to access programs, education, and functions. For thousands of people with disabilities, that most of us take is difficult or achievable only with the help of the third party.
